Package sprites

Class Enemy

java.lang.Object
sprites.Sprite
sprites.Enemy
public class Enemy
extends Sprite
Author:
Aviral Vaidya, Kevin Ren The Enemy class represents a double precision enemy which can be represented using processing

    • Enemy

      public Enemy​(aviral.shapes.Rectangle s, double vx, double vy, double ax, double ay)
      Creates an enemy
      Parameters:
      s - shape of enemy
      vx - x velocity of enemy
      vy - y velocity of enemy
      ax - x acceleration of enemy
      ay - y acceleration of enemy
